name: 簡德年
objective:
本課程在於協助同學了解數位轉型的浪潮趨勢，以及適應新科技所改變的商業模式。課程將介紹創新的商業模式例如共享經濟、金融科技、線上至離線、使用者生成內容等平台模式應用。每個模式將會連結到實務中企業個案，以協助同學進一步深入了解與分析創新的模式概念。本課程將涵蓋數位轉型與創新模式的基本概念，以數位轉型與科技適應角度，透過實務案例來了解創新商業模式。
This course aims to help students understand the trend of digital transformation and technology adaption in business models. The innovative business models will be introduced such as sharing economy, FinTech, online-to-offline, user-generated content, and so on. The matched cases will be selected to elaborate and analyze the innovative business models. This course will provide comprehensive knowledge of innovative business models by digital transformation and technology adaption (information and communication technology).
schedule:
Week 01	Course Introduction 
Week 02	Developing a Digital Transformation Blueprint: Vision, Alignment, and Commitment
Week 03	Selecting the Scope and Prioritizing Transformation Areas
Week 04	Defining Possibilities: Business Innovation through Technology
Week 05	Resource Mapping and Agile Team Structure Design
Week 06	Journal Reading (1): Theoretical Foundations and Integrated Frameworks of Digital Transformation (Theme 1)
Week 07	Journal Reading (2): Strategies and Organizational Capabilities for Digital Transformation (Theme 2)
Week 08	Journal Reading (3): Innovation and Business Model Renewal Driven by Digital Transformation (Theme 3)
Week 09	Midterm Project Presentation 
Week 10	Recruiting and Retaining Digital Talent: Building an Attractive Workplace
Week 11	Performance Systems and Reskilling for Technical Talent
Week 12	Agile Operations and Organizational Structure Redesign
Week 13	User Experience Design and Customer-Centric Innovation
Week 14	Building Technical Platforms and Cloud Strategy Implementation
Week 15	Final Project Presentation 
Week 16	Constitution Day – No Class
Week 17	Lunar New Year Holiday – No Class
Week 18	Final Presentation and Course Wrap-Up
scorePolicy:
Class Participation: 40%
Midterm Project: 30%
Final Project: 30%
materials:
Self-compiled materials will be used in this course. Slides and case studies will be prepared and provided during class sessions.

1. Eric Lamarre, Kate Smaje, Rodney Zemmel (2023). The McKinsey Guide to Outcompeting in the Age of Digital and AI. Wiley. ISBN: 978-1394207114

2. Alex Zarifis, Despo Ktoridou, Leonidas Efthymiou, Xusen Cheng (2023). Business Digital Transformation: Selected Cases from Industry Leaders. Palgrave Macmillan. ISBN: 978-3031336645
